docs.text: Welcome to Apollo Reads!!! ¶ Info August 22nd, 2022 ApolloReads started recording, editing, and uploading our narrating of childrens’ books to help children everywhere grow their linguistic, cognitive, social, and emotional skills. Reading to your child at a very young age is one of the most important things a parent can do, but we at Apollo Reads understand that not every parent has the schedule or ability to do this. That is why we aim to fill the gap and do our best to bring quality stories to your child on a daily basis to fuel your child’s creativity, boost their listening skills, and increase their vocabulary and language development. Please join us in starting this journey toward a better reading tomorrow for all of your children and the world! Reading and literacy is a lifetime gift!
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Info August 22nd, 2022 ApolloReads started recording, editing, and uploading our narrating of childrens’ books to help children everywhere grow their linguistic, cognitive, social, and emotional skills. Reading to your child at a very young age is one of the most important things a parent can do, but we at Apollo Reads understand that not every parent has the schedule or ability to do this. That is why we aim to fill the gap and do our best to bring quality stories to your child on a daily basis to fuel your child’s creativity, boost their listening skills, and increase their vocabulary and language development. Please join us in starting this journey toward a better reading tomorrow for all of your children and the world! Reading and literacy is a lifetime gift!
docs.title: Welcome to Apollo Reads!!!

docs.text: About Apollo Reads ¶ Success One night, not so long ago, in a California town not so far away, while we were reading bedtime stories, my son Apollo stopped us and asked if all childrens’ parents read them bedtime stories. After I explained to Apollo that not all parents had the time, money, or ability to read to their children every night, Apollo demanded that we read to all of those children. Apollo recently turned 5, and he has been learning to read, so he wanted to be the narrator on all of these stories! Unfortunatley, his current reading level won’t quite cut it for bedtime stories. BUT someday I know Apollo will transition into my current role, and he will become the ApolloReads.com narrator! We are doing this entirely voluntarily to satisfy Apollo’s emotionally intelligent demand that we bring reading and bedtime stories to all the children on the internet whose parents can’t. Please join me in thanking Apollo for his kind heart at such a young age, and we both hope you enjoy our bedtime stories. – Dad
docs.title: About Apollo Reads

Apollo recently turned 5, and he has been learning to read, so he wanted to be the narrator on all of these stories! Unfortunatley, his current reading level won’t quite cut it for bedtime stories. BUT someday I know Apollo will transition into my current role, and he will become the ApolloReads.com narrator! We are doing this entirely voluntarily to satisfy Apollo’s emotionally intelligent demand that we bring reading and bedtime stories to all the children on the internet whose parents can’t.
